display_name: Filtered: Overall Non-Supine RDI at 4% desat
description: Non-Supine RDI at 4% desat  [(Total number of apneas and hypopneas in non-supine body position associated with >= 4% desat) / (hours of sleep)]
calculations: 60*(hrop4 +   hnrop4 + carop4 + canop4 + oarop4 + oanop4 + marop4 + manrop4)/(remepop+nremepop)
